definitions.title: n.[m.] pl.
definitions.body: water-melons (Mish. [[אבטיח]], Sam. bt.yh.; cf. Löw:No. 297; Ar. bit.=iyxun etc.; perh. loan-word in Heb. cf. Sta:§ 258; mod. Egypt. baṭṭich, biṭṭich cf. reff. in Di Nu 11:5; on formation cf. Lag:BN 10, who comp. Eth. aqṭala)—Egyptian fruit, ´[[הָא]] Nu 11:5 (‖[[הִקִּשֻּׁאִים]], [[הֶֽחָחִיר]], [[הַבְּחָלִים]], [[הַשּׁוּמִים]]); LXX tou\v pe/ponav.
